text: John Bethell may refer to: *John Bethell (inventor) (c.1804–1867), British solicitor and inventor *John Bethell, 1st Baron Bethell (1861–1945), British banker and politician *John P. Bethell (1907–1981), American politician *John Bethell, 2nd Baron Bethell (1902–1965), Baron Bethell ==See also== *John Bethel (born 1957), Canadian ice hockey player
title: John Bethell
